post.content:
The information below is from Mike Lim.

An invitation to YOU…!
On behalf of Centennial Infant and Child Centre Foundation, I would like to invite you to participate in the RBC Family & Friends Day at Canada's Wonderland on Saturday, May 1st, 2010, the day before the park officially opens for the season.  
A portion of the proceeds from each ticket purchased will go towards The Yellow Bus Foundation and its recipient charities.  Last year Centennial received $6000.00 from this terrific event.
·        Exclusive to this event, there are two “special” ticket purchase options for you to choose: a one-day $27.00 ticket or a two-day $35.00 ticket.  Tickets are valid for May 1st only and two day ticket for May 1st and second day to be used before June 30th by the same person (tickets are non-transferable)
·        There is also a BBQ Luncheon available.  
·        See the attached flyer for more details.
For families that have children with special needs, Canada's Wonderland has a process in place to assist you.  Upon arrival at Wonderland, go to Guest Services and request a special park guide book for families with special needs.  This will explain the process to follow.
It is very important that we demonstrate our commitment to our charitable partners, so I encourage you to send this invitation to anyone on your personal address lists that may be interested in joining us at the event.
We are very excited about this event as it further enhances the charitable partnership between RBC, The Yellow Bus Foundation, Canada’s Wonderland, and Centennial!  See you on May 1st!
Website: http://www.canadaswonderland.com/#actions
Select “Tickets” then “Corporate Partners”
Company ID: RBC2010

Chair and President
post.title: Go to Wonderland!!
